title: xplay.bz
css: .c{width: 229px; border-radius: 8px; background:#7164be; margin: 10px;}.c-i{position: relative; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden}.c-t{width: 100%; height: 160px; display: table; text-align: center; position: relative;}.c-c{color: #fff; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: 500; font-size: 24px; display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle; text-shadow: 0 2px 3px #000}.c-l{position: absolute; width: 30px; height: 2px; top: 75%; left: 50%; margin-left: -15px; background: #7D2BEF}.c-m{position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover;}.c--s{width: 190px; }.c--s .c-t{height: 130px;}.c--s .c-c{ font-weight: 300; font-size: 20px;}.c--j{background: #323232;width: 233px;}.c--j .c-m{width: 25px;height: 25px;object-fit: contain;left: 10px;top: 10px;}.c--j .c-t{height: 90px;}.d{position: fixed; right: 0; width: 40%; bottom: -40px; padding: 15px 25px; overflow:hidden;z-index: 2; top: 0px;}.d-i{float: left; font-size: 17px; width: 25%; margin-bottom: 10px;}.d-g{float: left; width: 75%; font-size: 16px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis;}.d-i i{vertical-align: middle; width: 15px; margin-top: -3px}.d-i i:before{content: url(http://xplay.bz/img/i-2.png);width: 15px;}.d-g i{vertical-align: middle; width: 14px; margin-top: -2px}.d-g i:before{content: url(http://xplay.bz/img/i-1.png);width: 14px;}.d-i span,.d-g span,.d-q span{ text-transform: uppercase; } .d-t{font-weight: 600;    font-size: 30px;}.d-o{font-size: 21px; color: #9855f1}.d-d {margin: 25px 0 30px 0; line-height: 1.5; font-size: 20px; overflow: hidden;}.d-d > div:last-child{position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(34,34,34,0) 0%,rgba(34,34,34,1) 100%); height: 30px;}.d-l{font-weight: 600; font-size: 17px}.d-l > div{margin-bottom: 15px}.d-ln{display: inline-block; width: 30%;}.d-lv{display: inline-block; width: 70%; text-align: right; color: #9855f1; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; vertical-align: middle;}.r{position: fixed; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 40%; padding: 5px 22px 70px 22px;z-index: 2}.r-i{padding-top: 40px}.r-n{display: inline-block; width: 33%}.r-t{font-size: 19px;}.r-s{font-size: 50px; font-weight: 600}.r-q{ text-align: right; vertical-align: bottom;}.r-q > div{ color: #9855f1; font-size: 50px;}.r-d{color: #9855f1; font-size: 30px; padding-right: 30px;}.m{color: #fff; padding: 7px 15px; font-size: 16px; background: #222222; margin: 4px; border-radius: 5px; text-align: left; display: flex; align-items: center}.s{border-radius: 8px; background: #212121 url(http://xplay.bz/img/search.svg) no-repeat 98% 50%; background-size: 15px; color: #fff; padding: 10px 15px; box-shadow: 0 5px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.5); width: 600px; font-size: 14px; text-align: left; margin: 4px}.a{position: relative; padding: 15px; margin-bottom: 38px; width:150px;}.a-i{border-radius: 5px; overflow: hidden;}.a-i img{width: 100%; vertical-align: bottom; max-height: 224px; object-fit: cover; min-height: 224px}.a-n{position: absolute; top: 100%; left: 0; width: 100%; color: #c4c1b8; height: 70px; overflow: hidden; margin-top: -7px;}.a-n div{display: table; width: 100%; height: 20px;}.a-n span{display: table-cell; padding: 0 7px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; font-weight: 300; font-size: 19px}.a-r{position: absolute; top: 10%; right: 3px; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 17px; font-weight: 700; padding: 4px 8px; background-color: #ff9455;}.a-r.ns{top: 23%; background-color: #9855f1;}.a-r.b{background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(204,0,0,1) 0%,rgba(150,0,0,1) 100%);}.a-r.de{background: linear-gradient(to right, #ffbc54 0%,#ff5b55 100%);}.a-r.g{background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(205,235,142,1) 0%,rgba(165,201,86,1) 100%);color: #12420D;}.clear{clear: both}.htmlselected {background: #673ab7d1; border-radius: 8px;}.htmlselected .a-n {background: #2d324c; border-radius: 0px 0px 10px 10px; margin-top: -15px; padding-top: 8px; color: white;}@media screen and (min-width: 1900px) {.a{padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 60px; width:220px;}.a-i{border-radius: 6px;}.a-i img{max-height: 310px; min-height: 310px}.a-n{height: 96px; margin-top: -16px;}.a-n span{font-weight: 400; font-size: 26px}.htmlselected .a-n {margin-top: -24px;}.c{margin: 15px;}.c--s{width: 288px; }.c--s .c-t{height: 228px;}.c--s .c-c{ font-weight: 400; font-size: 26px;}.s{background-size: 22px; padding: 18px 15px; width: 700px; font-size: 22px; margin: 5px}.a-r{font-size: 20px; right: 8px;}.d-t{font-weight: 800;font-size: 44px;}.d-o{font-size: 30px;padding-top: 5px;}.d-d {font-size: 32px;font-weight: 400;}.r{padding: 5px 22px 75px 22px;}.r-t{font-size: 28px;}.r-s{font-size: 65px; font-weight: 700}.r-q > div{ font-size: 65px;}}body{background: #222;}#bottom,#bottom *{-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;    box-sizing: border-box;}#pr{background: none ;}#site{background: none ;}#content{padding-top: 0px;}#bottom{font-size: 14px ;z-index: 2;top: auto ;bottom: 0;left: 0;width: 100% ;height: auto ;}#scrsaver{z-index: 10 ;}#popUp{z-index: 6;}.btextss{float: none ;display: inline-block;}.btextss img{vertical-align: middle;float: none ;width: auto ;height: auto ;padding: 0 ;margin: 0 ;}.btextss > img{margin: 0 ;float: none ;-webkit-border-radius: 20px;   -moz-border-radius: 20px;        border-radius: 20px;padding: 0 ;-o-object-fit: cover;   object-fit: cover;display: none;}#bstatus{display: none ;height: auto ;}#btdiv{width: 100% ;float: none ;text-align: center ;padding-bottom: 3px;}#btdiv .btextss:before{content: '';display: inline-block;margin-right: 10px;width: 10px;height: 10px;-webkit-border-radius: 20px;   -moz-border-radius: 20px;        border-radius: 20px;background: #ddd;}.btextss + .btextss{margin-left: 10px;}#btdiv .btextss:nth-child(1):before{background: #D62C2C;}#btdiv .btextss:nth-child(2):before{background: #40A023;}#btdiv .btextss:nth-child(3):before{background: #EDD131;}#btdiv .btextss:nth-child(4):before{background: #2EA1DB;}#btdiv .btextss:nth-child(n+5){display: none;}#bottomMenu{display: none ;}#leftHalf{top: 70px ;height: 90.5% ;}#site{width: 1292px ;}#weather{position: absolute ;top: 0 ;right: 135px ;font-size: 19px;}#weather svg{height: 20px ;    width: 25px ; }#weather span:last-child{margin-top: -9px ;}#widget_date{display: none ;}#main{background: -webkit-linear-gradient(315deg, rgb(42, 42, 42) 0%, rgb(24, 25, 27) 100%) ;background: -moz-linear-gradient(315deg, rgb(42, 42, 42) 0%, rgb(24, 25, 27) 100%) ;background: -o-linear-gradient(315deg, rgb(42, 42, 42) 0%, rgb(24, 25, 27) 100%) ;background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgb(42, 42, 42) 0%, rgb(24, 25, 27) 100%) ;}#top2{overflow: initial ;z-index: 1;}#kb1 img,#kb2 img{vertical-align: middle;}#top2text{height: auto ;font-size: 16px ;padding: 2px 5px ;background: none ;width: 606px ;}#navtitle{overflow: hidden;-o-text-overflow: ellipsis;   text-overflow: ellipsis;}#navinfo{display: none ;}#navurl{padding-left: 0 ;max-width: 390px ;    -o-text-overflow: ellipsis;       text-overflow: ellipsis;}#kb1,#kb2{margin: 4px 0 0 0 ;height: auto ;line-height: 0 ;text-align: center ;}#page_load,#page_home{width: 15px ;    height: 15px ;padding: 2px ;float: none ;}#top2{height: auto ;    padding: 5px 5px 15px 5px ;background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(rgba(41,41,41,1)),color-stop(75%, rgba(41,41,41,1)),to(rgba(41,41,41,0))) ;background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(41,41,41,1) 0%,rgba(41,41,41,1) 75%,rgba(41,41,41,0) 100%) ;background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(41,41,41,1) 0%,rgba(41,41,41,1) 75%,rgba(41,41,41,0) 100%) ;background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(41,41,41,1) 0%,rgba(41,41,41,1) 75%,rgba(41,41,41,0) 100%) ;background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(41,41,41,1) 0%,rgba(41,41,41,1) 75%,rgba(41,41,41,0) 100%) ;width: 1275px ;z-index: 2 ;top: 30px ;}#scrollsite{height: 100% ;}#widget_time{width: auto ;font-size: 16px ;    font-weight: 300 ;position: absolute ;top: 5px ;right: 238px ;z-index: 1;left: auto ;float: none ;}#widget_time{}#top{background-color: rgb(84 113 131) ;height: 30px ;z-index: 2;}#vk{z-index: 5 ;}#inset{padding: 0px ;height: auto ;width: 100% ;z-index: 4 ;}#inset > div{height: 26px ;opacity: 1 ;-ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=100)";font-size: 18px ;margin: 0 ;    padding: 2px 10px ;line-height: 26px ;border: 0 ;-webkit-border-radius: 0px ;   -moz-border-radius: 0px ;        border-radius: 0px ;}#inset > div img{-o-object-fit: contain ;   object-fit: contain ;width: 20px ;height: 20px ;margin-top: 1px;}#inset > div > div{white-space: nowrap ;    overflow: hidden ;    -o-text-overflow: ellipsis ;       text-overflow: ellipsis ;}#inset #butacc{display: none ;}#top2text #editurl{background: none ;    color: #fff ;    font-size: 12px ;    border: 0 ;outline: none ;}#presearch{background: none ;}#PreSearch{background-color: rgb(33 33 34 / 85%) ;font-size: 20px ;}#rightHalf #icosearch{display: none ;}#rightHalf #search {position: static;top: 31px;border: 0 ;-webkit-border-radius: 0 ;-moz-border-radius: 0 ;border-radius: 0 ;left: 0;width: 100% ;right: 0;padding: 4px 0px 4px 44px ;z-index: 4 ;background: #282829 url(http://xplay.bz/img/search.svg) no-repeat 10px 50%;-moz-background-size: 20px;-o-background-size: 20px;background-size: 20px;color: #fff;border-bottom: 2px solid #9855f1 ;margin-top: 16px;}#rightHalf #presearch{position: static;    top: 72px;    left: 0;    right: 0;    width: auto ;    border: 0 ;    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 13px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.5) ;       -moz-box-shadow: 0 13px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.5) ;            box-shadow: 0 13px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.5) ;background-color: #4e4e4e ;z-index: 4 ;}#rightHalf #presearch > div{min-height: 200px;}#MenuCh,#submenu{z-index: 3 ;    border: 0px ;    -webkit-border-radius: 8px ;       -moz-border-radius: 8px ;            border-radius: 8px ;background-color: rgb(57 57 57) ;}body > div:last-child{z-index: 3 ;}.tme{background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(34,34,34,0) 0%,rgba(34,34,34,0) 1%,rgba(34,34,34,1) 68%,rgba(34,34,34,1) 100%); position: absolute; width: 100%; bottom: 0; z-index: 2; padding: 35px 10px 4px 10px; line-height: 1.2; text-align: left; font-size: 14px;}.tme > span{position: relative;}.htmlselected {background: #7164be;}
